unnormalised: Ani, poriksha samplyo, ani results chukle bair aile! Mhaka khobor asa, vat ravop marnnaso zata, sori? Khas korun tumhi bodachya website-acher satat refresh marit ravtat, ani tumchea navak lagun 90+% udo zata mhunn aso sodtat. To dius asa zaso chaiwalo sandek tea pornechya vatache ekdum borechai cup tumchea hatak diuta.
normalised: Tor, porikxa sompli, ani resultuchoi aila! Mhaka khobor asa, ravop kitlench trasdaik asunk xakta, kiteak nhõi? Khas korun tumi lagatar bordachin vebsaitt tazim korun, axea dhortan ki tumchin nanvank lagun noveaddik tot'teacho ankddo vattaun asa. Tem ek lamb divos zalyantor ek chait't'tvalo tumkam purnn kop divpak ravlya bhaxen zata.

unnormalised: Poile suvater, je konn pass zale tanka soglleank parbi! Ti 60% aaso va 85%, tumi puray kelem. Dhakyani, tumchach ek tapathapi dii. Maggi ani nirashan aslya ratrichya watak sodapachya parichayak yetai? Tem sapal zale. Ani je konn tanka zaitaych result mellunk nasle, bhai, tem sonvsarachem ont naslo. Jivanth ponth dhorun aslya athak zale, ani kaim athakam poripanthak wat kaddcho asa.
normalised: Poileam, pass zal'leank soglleank porben! Sat tot'teacho ankddo vo atth panchas tot'teacho ankddo asta zalearui, tumi tem korun dakhoilem. Kom'mo, tumhi apunnank patthir tapattun gheo. Maggi ani niraxonnan bhorlea ratrinchim adhyoinachim satram tumkam ugddas asa? Tem porinnam dil'lem. Ani zeank tankam zai aslem te resultuch mel'le nhõi, bhai, tem sonvsarak ont nhõi. Jivit purvenchim zaskeo dhorela, ani kednam zaskean thoddem tayari korpak lagta.

unnormalised: Mhaka mazi class 10 chi results ugdaita. CBSE, tornatteanchem trasachem ontim pariksha! Hanv ekdum bore 80% zai aso sodtalem, minimum. Mazi maian, zaitech bhartache maian bhaxen, mhaka IIT-JEE pass zanvchi ani engineer zanvchi drishti aslem. Dabavachi gajjal!
normalised: Mhaka apnnachem dasvichin resultuch ugddas asa. C-B-S-E, tarunnyachin dveshachim nimannim porikxa! Mhaka purnn atth tot'teacho ankddo zai aslem, kom'mit komi. Mhaji avoi-bapui, chodd bhartiy avoi-bapui bhaxen, mhaka I-I-T-J-E-E uchlo korun ek injinnyar zaunk divpak axea dhortale. Dabavixim ul'le!

unnormalised: Je dius results bair aile, to site crash zale, spast zala. Lakanvni amche satat refresh maritanvche ekech vellar! Ontim, ek daka sarta asa, hanv tenkle, 78%. Te 80 mhaka zai asle, punn bhai, tem dusmanachem na. Mazem ganitanchem score sobit zala, sodanch 82/100 zala, ani vigyana 75 zala. Punn English? Oh man, English mazo dusman aslo – ekdum kamich 68%.
normalised: Resultuch ail'lo dis, saitt fuddaun uddlem, spoxttuch. Lakho tumchi sodexin ekuch velar tazim kortale! Nimannen, kalak dhorun aslem tea uprant, mhaka tem dislem: sat tot'teacho ankddo. Atthi mhaka zai aslem, punn hey, bodde zhogdde nhõi. Mhaji gonitachin ankddo saro aslem, ekxannavim atth dokan vochotale, ani vig'n'nan sat panchas adravont aslem. Punn inglixin? O o, inglixin mhajen dusman - ek kom'mit sat tot'teacho ankddo.

unnormalised: Maji maian… bhai, sangtali aso kaim dukachi sigh zali. Punn mazi nani, tichya kalzak bhagvan devkaro, sangli, "Beta, marks tuka nirvayik nain. Tuka kitem borem asa ter techer dhyan dei." Tem mhaka laglem.
normalised: Mhaji avoi-bapui… kom'mo, apunn bhogunk zal'le nirashechi um'med dhortale. Punn mhaji nani, tichi ut'tom kallz, bollli, "Beta, ankddo tumchi odhikhar nirnnoi korto nhõi. Zeancher tumhi borem asa, tem vatter chit divo." Tem mhaka ragtagun ravlem.

unnormalised: Ashem, tim numbers – tim percentages, tim marks 100 pasun kaddun – tim fakt ek snapshot zala. Tim puray drishti dakoyin. Tim nirnayik dakoyin, kaim dukhtak kam, late-night watachya parichayen, amchem dabav amchech pasun asa mhunn.
normalised: Khorench, tea ankdde- tot'teacho ankddo, ekxanchim ankddo- tem ekuch chitr zaun asa. Tem purnn chitr dakhoito nhõi. Tem kalponik bud', ghoddkam korop, lamb ratrinchim adhyoinachim satram, mhaka tumhi ek dabavn dhorpak dhortat.

unnormalised: Hanv classmeetes dekhle je 98% soglyat zata punn akhirak tem avadhik kamak lagle je tanka dvesh korta. Ani hanv tanka dekhle je barech trasan udhartan punn akhirak tem ekdum safalach udyami, kalakar, ani karyakarte zata. Jivak eke bharech ponth zata jacheli kelavnk zaitak varta, sori?
normalised: Mhaka zatkarank distale zeank soglleant novem atth tot'teacho ankddo aslem, teank apunnak dhormachi kam kortale. Ani mhaka distale zeank bhartin dhormachi kam kartalem punn vevsai korun soddezankh bhokhe zalea, kalakaranak ani kamgireank zaytan zal'lea. Jivitak khellaun poddkaraun borem poddta, nhõi?

unnormalised: Ani, kitem shikshik zata? Tumchi safalachi utsav korta, tumchea asfalak sikta, ani ugddas kortat tumchem mulyanka ek number nirnayik nain mhunn. Tumhi 50% zala va 99%, tem ek watachi dhir zala, destination nain.
normalised: Tor, kiteak zai poddta? Tumchin pod'dea porbam ghanv, tumchin durbaltayen shikpa, ani tumchi mullachem ankddo sangta nhõi. Ponchas tot'teacho ankddo vo novem nov tot'teacho ankddo kaddlo tor, tem ek sopponnacha khondd, thoddeuch.

unnormalised: Konakui sangunk diyenk zainach. Bhair vach, tumka kitem avodta tem kara, ani tumchem nirdharak mark sonvsarant kara. Akherak, asal safalaka percentages-acher nain majar korta, punn khushali ani purokartar. Ani tem kaim poriksha sodanch parikshak zainach. Gulab jamunacho ek plate-acher utsav kara! Tumhi kamailam.
normalised: Konnak tumkam uttar divak vochuk dinaka. Thoddeunk bhair vochun, tumchin mogachi kam korunk, ani tumchin nisaun sonvsarak dukam korunk. Soddezank, khorem sopon tot'teacho ankddo sangtam nhõi, punn anondachi ani bhoktechi kam sangta. Ani tim kad'dhi porikxent porikxa korunk zaina. Gulab jamunacha poddkiyek porben! Tumhi tencho khodkholo kad'dila.
